text: Allaha tomadera jan'ye srjita bastu dbara chaya kare diyechena ebam pahara samuhe tomadera jan'ye atna gopanera jayaga karechena ebam tomadera jan'ye posaka tairi kare diyechena, ya tomaderake grisma ebam bipadera samaya raksa kare. Emanibhabe tini tomadera prati sbiya anugrahera purnata dana karena, yate tomara atnasamarpana kara.
